atk-abh02a14:3_0: 718. Idāni tadanantare paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge catassoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Paṭisambhidāti
atk-abh02a14:3_1: pabhedā. Yasmā pana parato atthe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidātiādimāha, tasmā na aññassa
atk-abh02a14:3_2: kassaci pabhedā, ñāṇasseva pabhedāti veditabbā. Iti ‘‘catasso paṭisambhidā’’ti padena
atk-abh02a14:3_3: cattāro ñāṇappabhedāti ayamattho saṅgahito. Atthapaṭisambhidāti atthe paṭisambhidā;
atk-abh02a14:3_5: ñāṇanti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ
atk-abh02a14:3_6: dhamme pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā nāma. Niruttippabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ
atk-abh02a14:3_7: niruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā nāma. Paṭibhānappabhedassa
atk-abh02a14:4_0: Idāni yathānikkhittā paṭisambhidā bhājetvā dassento atthe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a14:4_1: Tattha atthoti saṅkhepato hetuphalaṁ. Tañhi hetuvasena araṇīyaṁ gantabbaṁ pattabbaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:4_2: tasmā atthoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yaṁkiñci paccayasamuppannaṁ, nibbānaṁ, bhāsitattho,
atk-abh02a14:4_3: vipāko, kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā atthoti veditabbā. Taṁ atthaṁ paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a14:5_0: Dhammoti saṅkhepato paccayo. So hi yasmā taṁ taṁ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
atk-abh02a14:5_1: tasmā dhammoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu, ariyamaggo,
atk-abh02a14:5_2: bhāsitaṁ , kusalaṁ, akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammoti veditabbā. Taṁ dhammaṁ paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a14:6_0: Tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṁ atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti, tassā
atk-abh02a14:6_1: abhilāpe taṁ sabhāvaniruttiṁ saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṁ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe
atk-abh02a14:6_2: pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā. Evamayaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇā
atk-abh02a14:6_3: nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā. Kasmā? Yasmā saddaṁ sutvā ‘‘ayaṁ sabhāvanirutti,
atk-abh02a14:6_4: ayaṁ na sabhāvaniruttī’’ti jānanti. Paṭisambhidāppatto hi ‘‘phasso’’ti vutte ‘‘ayaṁ
atk-abh02a14:6_5: sabhāvaniruttī’’ti jānāti, ‘‘phassā’’ti vā ‘‘phassa’’nti vā vutte pana ‘‘ayaṁ na
atk-abh02a14:6_6: sabhāvaniruttī’’ti jānāti. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Aññaṁ panesa nāmaākhyātaupasaggabyañjanasaddaṁ
atk-abh02a14:6_7: jānāti na jānātīti? Yadaggena saddaṁ sutvā ‘‘ayaṁ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṁ na sabhāvaniruttī’’ti
atk-abh02a14:6_8: jānāti, tadaggena tampi jānissatīti. Taṁ pana nayidaṁ paṭisambhidākiccanti paṭikkhipitvā
atk-abh02a14:7_0: Tissadattatthero kira bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṁ gahetvā aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu ‘katarabhāsāya
atk-abh02a14:7_1: kathemī’ti pavāresi. Taṁ pana tena attano uggahe ṭhatvā pavāritaṁ, na paṭisambhidāya
atk-abh02a14:7_2: ṭhitena. So hi mahāpaññatāya taṁ taṁ bhāsaṁ kathāpetvā kathāpetvā uggaṇhi; tato uggahe
atk-abh02a14:8_0: Bhāsaṁ nāma sattā uggaṇhantīti vatvā ca panettha idaṁ kathitaṁ. Mātāpitaro hi daharakāle
atk-abh02a14:8_1: kumārake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nipajjāpetvā taṁ taṁ kathayamānā tāni tāni kiccāni karonti.
atk-abh02a14:8_2: Dārakā tesaṁ taṁ taṁ bhāsaṁ vavatthāpenti – iminā idaṁ vuttaṁ, iminā idaṁ vuttanti.
atk-abh02a14:8_3: Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbampi bhāsaṁ jānanti. Mātā damiḷī, pitā andhako. Tesaṁ
atk-abh02a14:8_4: jāto dārako sace mātukathaṁ paṭhamaṁ suṇāti, damiḷabhāsaṁ bhāsissati; sace pitukathaṁ
atk-abh02a14:8_5: paṭhamaṁ suṇāti, andhakabhāsaṁ bhāsissati. Ubhinnampi pana kathaṁ assuṇanto māgadhabhāsaṁ bhāsissati.
atk-abh02a14:9_0: Yopi agāmake mahāraññe nibbatto, tattha añño kathento nāma natthi, sopi attano dhammatāya
atk-abh02a14:9_1: vacanaṁ samuṭṭhāpento māgadhabhāsameva bhāsissati. Niraye, tiracchānayoniyaṁ, pettivisaye,
atk-abh02a14:9_2: manussaloke, devaloketi sabbattha māgadhabhāsāva ussannā. Tattha sesā oṭṭakirātaandhakayonakadamiḷabhāsādikā
atk-abh02a14:9_4: māgadhabhāsā na parivattati. Sammāsabuddhopi tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ tantiṁ āropento
atk-abh02a14:9_5: māgadhabhāsāya eva āropesi. Kasmā? Evañhi atthaṁ āharituṁ sukhaṁ hoti. Māgadhabhāsāya
atk-abh02a14:9_6: hi tantiṁ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṁ sotapathāgamanameva papañco;
atk-abh02a14:9_7: sote pana saṅghaṭṭitamatteyeva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti. Aññāya pana
atk-abh02a14:9_8: bhāsāya tantiṁ āruḷhaṁ pothetvā pothetvā uggahetabbaṁ hoti. Bahumpi uggahetvā pana
atk-abh02a14:9_9: puthujjanassa paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi. Ariyasāvako no paṭisambhidāppato nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a14:10_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhantassa pabhedagataṁ
atk-abh02a14:10_1: ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti. Imā pana catassopi paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṁ
atk-abh02a14:10_2: gacchanti, pañcahi kāraṇehi visadā hontīti veditabbā. Katamesu dvīsu? Sekkhabhūmiyañca
atk-abh02a14:10_5: asekkhabhūmiyaṁ pabhedaṁ gatā. Ānandattherassa cittassa gahapatino dhammikassa upāsakassa
atk-abh02a14:10_6: upālissa gahapatino khujjuttarāya upāsikāyāti evamādīnaṁ paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṁ
atk-abh02a14:10_7: pabhedaṁ gatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṁ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a14:11_0: Katamehi pañcahi kāraṇehi paṭisambhidā visadā hontīti? Adhigamena, pariyattiyā, savanena,
atk-abh02a14:11_1: paripucchāya, pubbayogenāti. Tattha ‘adhigamo’ nāma arahattaṁ. Tañhi pattassa paṭisambhidā
atk-abh02a14:11_2: visadā honti. ‘Pariyatti’ nāma buddhavacanaṁ. Tañhi uggaṇhantassa paṭisambhidā visadā
atk-abh02a14:11_3: honti. ‘Savanaṁ’ nāma dhammassavanaṁ. Sakkaccañhi dhammaṁ suṇantassa paṭisambhidā
atk-abh02a14:11_4: visadā honti. ‘Paripucchā’ nāma aṭṭhakathā. Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṁ kathentassa hi
atk-abh02a14:11_5: paṭisambhidā visadā honti. ‘Pubbayogo’ nāma pubbayogāvacaratā, atītabhave haraṇapaccāharaṇanayena
atk-abh02a14:11_6: pariggahitakammaṭṭhānatā; pubbayogāvacarassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti . Tattha
atk-abh02a14:11_7: arahattappattiyā punabbasukuṭumbikaputtassa tissattherassa paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ.
atk-abh02a14:11_8: So kira tambapaṇṇidīpe buddhavacanaṁ uggaṇhitvā paratīraṁ gantvā yonakadhammarakkhitattherassa
atk-abh02a14:11_9: santike buddhavacanaṁ uggaṇhitvā āgacchanto nāvaṁ abhiruhanatitthe ekasmiṁ pade uppannakaṅkho
atk-abh02a14:11_10: yojanasatamaggaṁ nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṁ gacchanto antarāmagge ekassa kuṭumbikassa
atk-abh02a14:11_11: pañhaṁ kathesi. So pasīditvā satasahassagghanikaṁ kambalaṁ adāsi. Sopi taṁ āharitvā
atk-abh02a14:11_12: ācariyassa adāsi. Thero vāsiyā koṭṭetvā nisīdanaṭṭhāne paribhaṇḍaṁ kāresi. Kimatthāyāti?
atk-abh02a14:11_13: Pacchimāya janatāya anuggahatthāyāti. Evaṁ kirassa ahosi – ‘‘amhākaṁ gatamaggaṁ āvajjetvā
atk-abh02a14:11_14: anāgate sabrahmacārino paṭipattiṁ pūretabbaṁ maññissantī’’ti. Tissattheropi ācariyassa
atk-abh02a14:11_15: santike kaṅkhaṁ chinditvā jambukolapaṭṭane oruyha cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ sammajjanavelāya vālikavihāraṁ
atk-abh02a14:11_16: patvā sammajji. Tassa sammajjitaṭṭhānaṁ disvā ‘idaṁ vītarāgassa bhikkhuno sammaṭṭhaṭṭhāna’nti
atk-abh02a14:11_17: therassa vīmaṁsanatthāya pañhaṁ pucchiṁsu. Thero paṭisambhidāppattatāya pucchitapucchite pañhe kathesīti.
atk-abh02a14:12_0: Pariyattiyā pana tissadattattherassa ceva nāgasenattherassa ca paṭisambhidā visadā
atk-abh02a14:12_1: ahesuṁ. Sakkaccadhammasavanena sudhammasāmaṇerassa paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ. So
atk-abh02a14:12_2: kira talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnattherassa bhāgineyyo khuraggeyeva arahattaṁ patto mātulattherassa
atk-abh02a14:12_3: dhammavinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā suṇantoyeva tīṇi piṭakāni paguṇāni akāsi. Uggahitapāḷiyā
atk-abh02a14:12_4: atthaṁ kathentassa pana tissadattattherassa eva paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ. Gatapaccāgatavattaṁ
atk-abh02a14:12_5: pana pūretvā yāva anulomaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ ussukkāpetvā āgatānaṁ visadabhāvappattapaṭisambhidānaṁ
atk-abh02a14:13_0: Etesu pana kāraṇesu pariyatti, savanaṁ, paripucchāti imāni tīṇi pabhedasseva balavakāraṇāni.
atk-abh02a14:13_1: Pubbayogo adhigamassa balavapaccayo, pabhedassa hoti na hotīti? Hoti, na pana tathā.
atk-abh02a14:13_2: Pariyattisavanaparipucchā hi pubbe hontu vā mā vā, pubbayogena pubbe ceva etarahi
atk-abh02a14:13_3: ca saṅkhārasammasanaṁ vinā paṭisambhidā nāma natthi. Ime pana dvepi ekato hutvā paṭisambhidā
atk-abh02a14:16_0: 719. Idāni ye saṅgahavāre pañca atthā ca dhammā ca saṅgahitā, tesaṁ pabhedadassananayena
atk-abh02a14:16_1: paṭisambhidā vibhajituṁ puna catassotiādinā nayena pabhedavāro āraddho. So saccavārahetuvāradhammavārapaccayākāravārapariyattivāravasena
atk-abh02a14:16_2: pañcavidho. Tattha paccayasamuppannassa dukkhasaccassa paccayena pattabbassa nibbānassa
atk-abh02a14:16_3: ca atthabhāvaṁ, phalanibbattakassa samudayassa nibbānasampāpakassa ariyamaggassa
atk-abh02a14:16_4: ca dhammabhāvañca dassetuṁ ‘saccavāro’ vutto. Yassa kassaci pana hetuphalanibbattakassa
atk-abh02a14:16_5: hetuno dhammabhāvaṁ, hetuphalassa ca atthabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘hetuvāro’ vutto. Tattha
atk-abh02a14:16_6: ca hetuphalakkamavasena uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā. Ye pana
atk-abh02a14:16_7: dhammā tamhā tamhā rūpārūpappabhedā hetuto jātā, tesaṁ atthabhāvaṁ, tassa tassa ca
atk-abh02a14:16_8: rūpārūpadhammappabhedassa hetuno dhammabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘dhammavāro’ vutto. Jarāmaraṇādīnaṁ
atk-abh02a14:16_9: pana atthabhāvaṁ, jarāmaraṇādisamudayasaṅkhātānaṁ jātiādīnañca dhammabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ
atk-abh02a14:16_10: ‘paccayākāravāro’ vutto. Tato pariyattisaṅkhātassa tassa tassa bhāsitassa dhammabhāvaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:16_11: bhāsitasaṅkhātena paccayena pattabbassa bhāsitatthassa ca atthabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘pariyattivāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:17_0: Tattha ca yasmā bhāsitaṁ ñatvā tassattho ñāyati, tasmā bhāsitabhāsitatthakkamena
atk-abh02a14:17_1: uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā. Pariyattidhammassa ca pabhedadassanatthaṁ
atk-abh02a14:17_2: ‘‘tattha katamā dhammapaṭisambhidā’’ti pucchāpubbaṅgamo paṭiniddesavāro vutto. Tattha
atk-abh02a14:17_3: suttantiādīhi navahi aṅgehi nippadesato tanti gahitā. Ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa attho,
atk-abh02a14:17_4: ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa atthoti imasmimpi ṭhāne bhāsitavasena nippadesato tanti eva gahitāti.
atk-abh02a14:20_0: 725. Tattha tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā. Atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttaramissakā .
atk-abh02a14:20_1: Sā hi nibbānārammaṇānaṁ maggaphalañāṇānaṁ vasena lokuttarāpi hoti. Abhidhammabhājanīye
atk-abh02a14:20_2: kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṁ vasena catūhi vārehi vibhattaṁ. Tattha yattakāni heṭṭhā
atk-abh02a14:20_3: cittuppādakaṇḍe (dha. sa. 1 ādayo) kusalacittāni vibhattāni, tesaṁ sabbesampi vasena
atk-abh02a14:20_4: ekekasmiṁ cittaniddese catasso catasso paṭisambhidā vibhattāti veditabbā. Akusalacittesupi
atk-abh02a14:20_5: eseva nayo. Vipākakiriyavāresu vipākakiriyānaṁ atthena saṅgahitattā, dhammapaṭisambhidaṁ
atk-abh02a14:20_6: chaḍḍetvā, ekekasmiṁ vipākacitte ca kiriyacitte ca tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a14:20_7: Pāḷi pana mukhamattameva dassetvā saṁkhittā. Sā heṭṭhā āgatavitthāravaseneva veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:21_0: Kasmā pana yathā kusalākusalavāresu ‘‘tesaṁ vipāke ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā’’ti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:21_1: evamidha ‘‘yesaṁ dhammānaṁ ime vipākā, tesu ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā’’ti evaṁ na
atk-abh02a14:21_2: vuttanti? Heṭṭhā vuttattā. Yadi evaṁ, ‘‘tesaṁ vipāke ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā’’ti
atk-abh02a14:21_3: heṭṭhā vuttattā ayaṁ atthapaṭisambhidāpi idha na vattabbā siyāti? No na vattabbā.
atk-abh02a14:21_4: Kasmā? Heṭṭhā vipākakiriyacittuppādavasena avuttattā. Kiriyavāre ca ‘‘yesaṁ dhammānaṁ
atk-abh02a14:21_5: ime kiriyā’’ti vacanameva na yujjatīti dvīsupi imesu vāresu tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a14:22_0: Tattha yāya niruttiyā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ paññatti hotīti yāya niruttiyā tesaṁ phasso
atk-abh02a14:22_1: hotītiādinā nayena vuttānaṁ dhammānaṁ ‘‘ayaṁ phasso, ayaṁ vedanā’’ti evaṁ paññatti
atk-abh02a14:22_2: hoti. Tattha dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṁ atthe dhamme ca pavattamānāya tassā
atk-abh02a14:22_3: dhammaniruttiyā sabhāvapaññattiyā abhilāpe ñāṇaṁ. Abhilāpasaddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā
atk-abh02a14:22_4: uppannañāṇameva idhāpi kathitaṁ. Yena ñāṇenāti yena paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāñāṇena.
atk-abh02a14:22_5: Tāniñāṇāni jānātīti itarāni tīṇi paṭisambhidāñāṇāni jānāti.
atk-abh02a14:23_0: Idāni yathā yaṁ ñāṇaṁ tāni ñāṇāni jānāti, tathā tassa tesu pavattiṁ dassetuṁ imāni
atk-abh02a14:23_1: ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti vuttaṁ. Tattha idamatthajotakānīti imassa atthassa jotakāni
atk-abh02a14:23_2: pakāsakāni; imaṁ nāma atthaṁ jotenti pakāsenti paricchindantīti attho. Iti ñāṇesu
atk-abh02a14:23_3: ñāṇanti iminā ākārena pavattaṁ tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:24_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā ‘imissā idaṁ kiccaṁ, imissā idaṁ kicca’nti
atk-abh02a14:24_1: itarāsaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ kiccaṁ jānāti, sayaṁ pana tāsaṁ kiccaṁ kātuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a14:24_2: bahussutadhammakathiko viya appassutadhammakathikassa. Dve kira bhikkhū. Eko bahussuto,
atk-abh02a14:24_3: eko appassuto. Te ekatova ekaṁ dhammakathāmaggaṁ uggaṇhiṁsu. Tattha appassuto sarasampanno
atk-abh02a14:24_4: ahosi, itaro mandassaro. Tesu appassuto gatagataṭṭhāne attano sarasampattiyā sakalaparisaṁ
atk-abh02a14:24_5: khobhetvā dhammaṁ kathesi. Dhammaṁ suṇamānā haṭṭhatuṭṭhamānasā hutvā – ‘yathā esa
atk-abh02a14:24_6: dhammaṁ kathesi, eko tipiṭakadharo maññe bhavissatī’ti vadanti. Bahussutabhikkhu
atk-abh02a14:24_7: pana – ‘dhammasavane jānissatha ayaṁ tipiṭakadharo vā no vā’ti āha. So kiñcāpi evamāha,
atk-abh02a14:24_8: yathā pana sakalaparisaṁ khobhetvā dhammaṁ kathetuṁ sakkoti, evamassa kathanasamatthatā
atk-abh02a14:24_9: natthi. Tattha kiñcāpi paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā, bahussuto viya appassutassa, itarāsaṁ
atk-abh02a14:24_10: kiccaṁ jānāti, sayaṁ pana taṁ kiccaṁ kātuṁ na sakkotīti veditabbaṁ. Sesaṁ uttānatthameva.
atk-abh02a14:25_0: 746. Evaṁ kusalacittuppādādivasena paṭisambhidā vibhajitvā idāni tāsaṁ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṁ
atk-abh02a14:25_1: khettaṁ dassetuṁ puna catasso paṭisambhidātiādimāha. Tattha tisso paṭisambhidā kāmāvacarakusalato
atk-abh02a14:25_2: catūsu ñāṇasampayuttesu cittuppādesūti idaṁ sekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ. Tesañhipi dhammapaccavekkhaṇakāle
atk-abh02a14:25_3: heṭṭhā vuttaṁ pañcappakāraṁ dhammaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu
atk-abh02a14:25_4: dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati. Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā
atk-abh02a14:25_5: niruttipaṭisambhidā; ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a14:26_0: Kiriyato catūsūti idaṁ pana asekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ. Tesañhi dhammaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle
atk-abh02a14:26_1: heṭṭhā vuttaṁ pañcappakāraṁ dhammaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu
atk-abh02a14:26_2: dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati. Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā
atk-abh02a14:26_3: niruttipaṭisambhidā; ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a14:27_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā etesu ceva uppajjatīti idaṁ pana sekkhāsekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:27_1: Tathā hi sekkhānaṁ atthapaccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedaṁ atthaṁ ārammaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a14:27_2: katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu ayaṁ uppajjati, maggaphalakāle ca maggaphalesu.
atk-abh02a14:27_3: Asekkhassa pana atthaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedameva atthaṁ ārammaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a14:27_4: katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu uppajjati, phalakāle ca uparime sāmaññaphaleti.
atk-abh02a14:27_5: Evametā sekkhāsekkhānaṁ uppajjamānā imāsu bhūmīsu uppajjantīti bhūmidassanatthaṁ
atk-abh02a14:30_0: 747. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva catunnaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a14:30_1: Ārammaṇattikesu pana niruttipaṭisambhidā saddameva ārammaṇaṁ karotīti parittārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:30_5: paccavekkhantassa appamāṇārammaṇā. Dhammapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaraṁ kusaladhammaṁ akusaladhammaṁ
atk-abh02a14:30_7: dhammaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa mahaggatārammaṇā ; lokuttaraṁ kusalaṁ
atk-abh02a14:30_10: kusalavipākakiriyañāṇāni paccavekkhantassa tesaṁ ārammaṇāni vijānantassa mahaggatārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a14:31_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā sahajātahetuvasena siyā maggahetukā, vīriyajeṭṭhikāya maggabhāvanāya
atk-abh02a14:31_1: siyā maggādhipati, chandacittajeṭṭhikāya navattabbā, phalakālepi navattabbā eva.
atk-abh02a14:31_2: Dhammapaṭisambhidā maggaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇā, maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a14:31_4: maggārammaṇā, maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa maggādhipati, sesañāṇaṁ pañcavekkhaṇakāle
atk-abh02a14:31_5: navattabbārammaṇā . Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannameva saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karotīti paccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:32_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā atītaṁ vipākatthaṁ kiriyatthaṁ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a14:32_1: atītārammaṇā, anāgataṁ paccavekkhantassa anāgatārammaṇā, paccuppannaṁ paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a14:32_2: paccuppannārammaṇā, lokuttaraṁ paramatthaṁ paccavekkhantassa navattabbārammaṇā. Dhammapaṭisambhidā
atk-abh02a14:32_3: atītaṁ kusalaṁ akusalaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā, anāgataṁ
atk-abh02a14:32_5: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā atītaṁ kusalañāṇaṁ vipākañāṇaṁ kiriyañāṇañca paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a14:32_6: atītārammaṇā, anāgataṁ paccavekkhantassa anāgatārammaṇā, paccuppannaṁ paccavekkhantassa paccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:33_0: Niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇattā bahiddhārammaṇā. Itarāsu tīsu atthapaṭisambhidā
atk-abh02a14:33_1: ajjhattaṁ vipākatthaṁ kiriyatthaṁ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a14:33_2: bahiddhā paccavekkhantassa bahiddhārammaṇā, ajjhattabahiddhā paccavekkhantassa ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā
atk-abh02a14:33_3: , paramatthaṁ paccavekkhantassa bahiddhārammaṇā eva. Dhammapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṁ
atk-abh02a14:33_4: kusalākusalaṁ paccayadhammaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇā, bahiddhā kusalākusalaṁ
atk-abh02a14:34_0: Idhāpi tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā; atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttarā. Imasmiñhi paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge
atk-abh02a14:34_1: sammāsambuddhena tayopi nayā lokiyalokuttaramissakattā ekaparicchedāva kathitā. Tīsupi
atk-abh02a14:34_2: hi etāsu tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā, atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttarāti. Evamayaṁ
